task.en: I want to enable crossfade while switching songs in Music. Please help me navigate to the corresponding settings panel.
task.zh: 我想在Music中切歌的时候能够有cross fade。请帮我找到那个相应的设置面板。
task.ar: أريد تمكين ميزة التحول التدريجي (Crossfade) أثناء التبديل بين الأغاني في تطبيق Music. ساعدني في الانتقال إلى لوحة الإعدادات المقابلة.
task.ja: Musicアプリで曲を切り替えるときにcrossfadeを有効にしたいです。対応する設定パネルを案内してください。
task.ru: Я хочу включить crossfade при переключении треков в приложении Music. Покажите, как найти соответствующую панель настроек.

in_process: osascript -e 'display dialog "Navigate to cross fade settings, please click here!" with title "Shortcut" buttons {"Cancel", "OK"} default button "OK"'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of scroll area 1 of group 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "checkbox Crossfade Songs" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of scroll area 1 of group 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "checkbox 交叉渐入渐出歌曲" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of scroll area 1 of group 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "checkbox تداخل الأغاني" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of scroll area 1 of group 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "checkbox 曲をクロスフェード" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXChildren" of scroll area 1 of group 1 of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "checkbox Затухание песен" && echo "True" || echo "False"
